mapper.insert: INSERT INTO logans_field (task_id, field_key, field_remark) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{fieldKey}, #{fieldRemark})
mapper.select:
SELECT id, task_id taskId, field_key fieldKey, field_remark fieldRemark FROM logans_field WHERE 1 = 1
AND task_id = #{taskId}
AND field_key LIKE CONCAT('%', #{fieldKey}, '%')
AND field_remark LIKE CONCAT('%', #{fieldRemark}, '%')
ORDER BY id DESC
